name: ai-centar-lipik
description: Repository used for the projects and learning materials related to AI and Python programming at AI Center Lipik.

scripts.build: docker build -t jnc-process . && docker run --rm -v .:/app jnc-process node /app/scripts/build-static-site.js
scripts.validate: docker build -t jnc-process . && docker run --rm jnc-process node /app/scripts/validate.js
scripts.local:build: npm install && node scripts/build-static-site.js && sudo cp -r dist/* /var/www/html/ai-centar-lipik
